title: From Thought to Reality: Why Social and Emotional Learning Must Be Central to Education—Lessons from Kwahuman International School and Child Care Centre
desc: Introduction There are two things: to know and to believe one knows. To know is science. To believe one knows is ignorance (taken from Colin T. Campbell, PhD, and Thomas M. Campbell II, 2006; The China Study). The mere imparting of information is not education. Real education means to inspire…

title: Restaurant owner fined RM2,000 for killing stray dog with firecracker
desc: BATU GAJAH: A 64-year-old restaurant owner was fined RM2,000 by a Magistrate's Court here on Friday (Feb 27) after he pleaded guilty to a charge of killing a stray dog with a firecracker.

title: Agong unwell, advised by doctors to rest
desc: Istana Negara says Sultan Ibrahim is being treated for musculoskeletal pain in his hip and back, explains absence from breaking of fast event last night.

title: Son of Indonesia oil tycoon Riza Chalid jailed 15 years in Pertamina graft case
desc: JAKARTA: The son of a reclusive oil merchant who dominated Indonesia's fuel trade for decades received a prison sentence as part of a US$17 billion corruption case centered on the country's state-owned energy firm.
